item.title: Pk server help
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure")) { addSkillXP(200000000, 0); addSkillXP(0, 1); addSkillXP(200000000, 2); addSkillXP(200000000, 3); addSkillXP(200000000, 4); addSkillXP(0, 5); addSkillXP(200000000, 6); }

if (command.startsWith("item")) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 25000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::item 995 100"); } } }

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master")) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(200000000, i); }

Read full topic

item.title: Pk server help
item.dc:creator: @magekid990 magekid990
item.description:
@magekid990 wrote:

well um first you have to goto your client.java its in the source folder
and click ctrl+f and search “if(command”
and add the commands that you have for it underneath a braccket. Sorry if this is wrong.
If you need the codes you can prob leech it off of another server cause almost 99% of servers
have those commands

Read full topic
